data.actual_result: That bar stays on top of your keyboard and then jumps down when it auto closes to where is supposed to be
data.expected_result: The bar that has your name, QuickSwitcher, @ mentions and User Settings is behind the keyboard before it auto closes
data.short_description: Username bar with QS, @ mentions and User Settings stays above keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 781 - Go to a channel or DM - Type something and send it - Swipe to the right or tap the 3 lines to open the server/channel list list
